Combat.description: The player may be expected to fight enemies/bosses with less equipment than usual.

Movement.description: The player may be expected to use unique movement to traverse a room or complete an action.

ShinesparkTrick.description: The player may be expected to use shinesparking to traverse a room. All vanilla locations where shinesparks are expected are considered trickless.

Knowledge.description: The player may be expected to know alternate enemy/block weaknesses or be able to identify potential softlocks risks.

DamageRuns.description: The player may be expected to traverse a room while taking damage from the environment (Heat/Lava/Cold/Electric).

WallJump.description: The player may be expected to Wall Jump to traverse rooms vertically. All vanilla locations where Wall Jumps are expected are considered trickless.

JBJ.description: The player may be expected to place bombs midair and then get hit by them to gain more height.

StandOnFrozenEnemies.description: The player may be expected to stand on frozen enemies to traverse a room. All vanilla locations where standing on frozen enemies is expected are considered trickless.

UnderwaterWallJump.description: The player may be expected to wall jump underwater to traverse rooms vertically.

MidAirMorph.description: The player may be expected to morph mid-air to access tunnels without Bombs or Spring Ball.

JumpExtends.description: The player may be expected to extend their jump horizontally by re-spinning multiple times to traverse a room.

DamageBoosts.description: The player may be expected to take intentional damage from an enemy to traverse a room or complete an action.

extra.description: A resource for working around current shortcomings in the generator
